translation.en: -[man 1] Hang in there, buddy. -[man 2] C'mon, now.
It's just so beautiful.
No, that is not what we're doing.
translation.ko: 아니 그건 우리가 하는 일이 아니야

translation.en: This is what we're doing.
Yeah, you got this.
Good morning, Becky.
-Hey, John, how's Arlo? -Finally sleeping through the night.
translation.ko: - 존, 알로는 어때? - 드디어 밤새 자요

translation.en: I told you he'd figure it out.
Melissa, loved that calculation on the activator-thymine ratios.
translation.ko: 멀리사 활성 티민 비율 계산 좋았어

translation.en: -Aw, thanks, boss. Appreciate it. -And I appreciate you.
What… Pete, who is this?
My daughter, Sophia. We had a childcare issue.
translation.ko: 제 딸 소피아예요 애를 맡길 곳이 없어서요

translation.en: I hope that's okay. She will stay out of the way.
translation.ko: 이해해 주셨으면 좋겠네요 얌전히 있을 거예요

translation.en: Of course. Sophia, never stay out of the way.
translation.ko: 물론이지 소피아, 절대 얌전히 있지 마

translation.en: Ask questions, challenge assumptions, disrupt shit.
Maybe throw some.
I'll try.
So, sweetheart, do you even know what we do here?
translation.ko: 얘야 우리가 여기서 뭘 하는지 아니?

translation.en: Biotechnology.
Yes, and do you know what that important-sounding word means?
translation.ko: 그래, 그 거창한 단어가 무슨 뜻인지 알아?

translation.en: Biotechnology, or biotech, is any research and development
translation.ko: 생명 공학, 혹은 바이오테크는 인간의 목적에 따라

translation.en: that involves modifying a living organism to meet a human purpose.
translation.ko: 살아 있는 유기체를 변형하는 모든 연구와 개발을 말해요

translation.en: Okay. So she kind of knows.
It includes everything from genetic engineering, to biofuels,
to creating an enzyme, like you did,
that can turn sugar cane into a plastic-like material
translation.ko: 사탕수수를 완전 생분해되는 플라스틱 같은 물질로 바꾸는

translation.en: that’s completely biodegradable.
-Technically, it's not plastic. -I said, "plastic-like."
It's a polyethylene.
It’s actually a bio-polyethylene.
-I know that. -Didn't sound like you did.
-How could I not know if I invented it? -That's what I was wondering.
translation.ko: - 내가 만든 걸 왜 몰라? - 저도 그게 의문이었어요

translation.en: There are Cocoa Puffs in the kitchen, honey.
Okay, I am going to get some Cocoa Puffs
in my kitchen of my company that I created.
Yeah, I understand, Ted. Ellis is doing great.
translation.ko: 네, 이해해요, 테드 대표님 연구에는 문제없어요

translation.en: I think he spent last night in the lab. I can assure you, he is laser focused.
translation.ko: 어젯밤에도 연구실에서 주무셨죠 엄청나게 집중하고 계세요

translation.en: I do not like any of our spoons.
translation.ko: 우리 숟가락 다 마음에 안 들어

translation.en: Wait. No, I don't care.
The board is nervous.
I'll tell you what I do like. The new infrared sauna in my office. Thank you.
translation.ko: 내 마음에 드는 건 사무실에 새로 들인 적외선 사우나야, 고마워

translation.en: What kind of dreadful CFO would I be if I didn't approve an infrared sauna
translation.ko: 적외선 사우나를 승인 안 할 고약한 CFO가 어딨겠어요?

translation.en: so you could heat yourself from the inside out like a microwave burrito?
translation.ko: 대표님이 전자레인지용 부리토처럼 몸을 속속들이 데우겠다는데

translation.en: I have more clarity when my bone marrow's warm.
Are you all right? It's just you seem to be getting more, maybe…
I don't know. Why dance around it? Crazier.
translation.ko: 돌려 말할 필요 없죠 미쳐 가는 것 같아요

translation.en: Crazier? Or am I just letting the beauty of the world
translation.ko: 세상의 아름다움이 더 심오한 방식으로 날 감동시킨다고 볼 수도 있지

translation.en: move me in a more profound way?
translation.ko: 더 심오한 방식으로 날 감동시킨다고 볼 수도 있지

translation.en: That's literally the same thing.
We have 15 minutes till the board meeting.
They're going to want to hear that you absolutely will meet the latest benchmark on the carbon project.
translation.ko: 탄소 프로젝트의 최신 목표를 달성할 수 있단 확신을 주세요

translation.en: I have done everything I can to buy you more time,
translation.ko: 시간을 벌어 드리려고 이것저것 다 했는데

translation.en: but since you keep missing deadlines,
you are now in danger of losing control of your company.
I'm not breathing with you.
[exhales] It'll calm you.
I believe I'm at exactly the right level of agitation.
translation.ko: 감사하지만 지금 제 흥분 수준은 지극히 정상이에요

translation.en: Stop breathing.
The board has noticed that the corporate therapist they got you has disappeared,
translation.ko: 이사회에서 고용한 대표님 상담사가 없어진 걸 알고

translation.en: so they’re also wondering about that.
Anna, we are doing something that has never been done before.
translation.ko: 애나, 우리는 지금 전에 없던 일을 하고 있어

translation.en: Something that will change the world.
And that requires tremendous creativity.
And if Einstein is right that “creativity is intelligence having fun,”
translation.ko: 창의력은 즐길 줄 아는 지능이란 아인슈타인 말이 옳다면

translation.en: then the enemy of creativity is behaving.
Okay, I see why people believe in you.
I'll meet you in the conference room at 9:45. Don't be late.
And don't eat with two spoons.
-And you're late. -[Ellis] Don't come in.
Oh God.
What are you doing?
I want to have the board meeting in the sauna
translation.ko: 사우나에서 회의를 열고 싶어 사람들이 솔직해지거든

translation.en: because it keeps people honest. And then, I was looking for a towel, and…
translation.ko: 사우나에서 회의를 열고 싶어 사람들이 솔직해지거든 그리고 수건을 찾고 있었는데…

translation.en: I just really enjoy being naked.
translation.ko: 난 홀딱 벗는 게 정말 즐거워

translation.en: Maybe you came back too soon.
No, no. It's good for me to stay engaged.
translation.ko: 아니야, 일하는 게 더 도움 돼

translation.en: Katie's accident was only a couple of months ago, Ellis.
translation.ko: 사모님 사고 난 지 몇 달밖에 안 됐어요

translation.en: You were married for 30 years, so maybe--
No, no, no. Katie would've wanted me to keep going.
translation.ko: 아니, 케이티는 내가 계속 나아가길 바랐을 거야

translation.en: Of course, I wanted her to keep going.
translation.ko: 물론 나도 케이티가 계속 나아가길 바랐고

translation.en: Ellis, I'm so sorry she's gone.
Thank you.
Could you excuse me, please? I'd like to be naked again
translation.ko: 잠깐 나가 줄래? 다시 홀딱 벗고

translation.en: and feel the cold air on my forlorn genitalia.
translation.ko: 쓸쓸한 내 생식기에 찬 바람을 쐬고 싶어

translation.en: I will reschedule the board.
I’ll tell them that you’re fine, but a bat bit you,
or you inhaled bat guano, or something to do with a bat.
translation.ko: 박쥐 배설물 비료를 흡입했다든가 아무튼 박쥐랑 관련된 거요

translation.en: Everyone hates bats right now.
Anna.
You do so much for me that I hesitate to tell you this next bit
translation.ko: 날 위해 너무 애써 줘서 입이 잘 안 떨어지네

translation.en: because you're not gonna like it.
It has to do with the therapist the board got me.
translation.ko: 이사회가 고용한 내 상담사랑 관련된 거야

translation.en: Oh God.
Malcolm, you know how you're obsessed with Ellis and would do anything for him?
translation.ko: 맬컴, 자기는 대표님께 집착하고 그분을 위해서라면 뭐든 할 거지?

translation.en: -Yes. -We are up against a deadline.
I need Ellis in the lab, but he’s spiraling.
translation.ko: 대표님은 연구실에 계셔야 하는데 감정이 소용돌이쳐

translation.en: -Upward? -Yes, Malcolm.
His wife, who he loved more than anything has died,
and so, like an airplane that's lost its wings, he's spiraling upward.
translation.ko: 날개 잃은 비행기처럼 하늘 끝까지 올라가셨지

translation.en: I know. It is in fact downward.
It's more than just Katie's loss. The woman kept him grounded.
translation.ko: 사모님의 죽음도 죽음이지만 그분은 대표님을 안정시켰어

translation.en: I feel like he's a week away from living in a park debating fusion with squirrels.
translation.ko: 이러다가는 곧 공원에서 다람쥐 융합에 관해 논쟁할 판이야

translation.en: He loved Katie with an intensity only found in music and poetry.
translation.ko: 음악이나 시에서만 찾을 수 있는 강렬함으로 사모님을 사랑하셨죠

translation.en: Almost like you love him.
-I'm sending you to New York. -Okay. Why?
To bring back the one person who might be able to ground him like Katie did.
translation.ko: 사모님처럼 대표님을 안정시킬 수 있는 사람을 데려와

translation.en: Okay. Who?
Okay. Better than last week. Was it?
Totally. Last week, Mrs. Fetterman banged on the wall,
translation.ko: 완전, 지난주에는 페터먼 부인이 벽을 쾅쾅 쳤잖아

translation.en: so clearly, she's seeing improvement as well.
translation.ko: 부인도 네 실력이 는 걸 알아보시는 거지

translation.en: -What's wrong? -I don't even want to play the flute.
translation.ko: - 왜 그래? - 전 플루트 불기 싫어요

translation.en: My dad makes me.
Father-son stuff, man. Don't get me started.
translation.ko: 부자 문제라면 내가 잘 알지 말도 마

translation.en: -Okay. -You try so hard to please them, right?
translation.ko: - 알겠어요 - 넌 아버지를 위해 죽어라 하는데

translation.en: But they want to make you a certain way, even if that's not who you want to be.
translation.ko: 아버지는 널 네가 바라지도 않는 사람으로 만들려고 하시지

translation.en: And you hope that one day that dynamic will change,
translation.ko: 넌 그런 역학 관계가 바뀌길 바라지만

translation.en: but when you realize it won't,
translation.ko: 그럴 수 없단 걸 깨닫는 순간 이 사실을 받아들이게 돼

translation.en: you come to terms with the fact that no matter how much you love them,
translation.ko: 그럴 수 없단 걸 깨닫는 순간 이 사실을 받아들이게 돼 네가 아버지를 얼마나 사랑하든 거리를 둬야 한단 걸

translation.en: you gotta take a break, and that break is painful,
translation.ko: 네가 아버지를 얼마나 사랑하든 거리를 둬야 한단 걸 그건 고통스럽지

translation.en: but let me tell you something, Ryan, it's also restorative.
So is the lesson over? No, little buddy.
The lesson's never over.
Not until we learn how to navigate that very complicated relationship.
translation.ko: 우리가 그 복잡한 관계를 헤쳐 나가는 법을 배울 때까지

translation.en: He's doing great.
It's me!
It's you!
Dude, when's the last time you ate?
Teaching flute doesn't bring in a lot of money, so I don't get out much.
translation.ko: 플루트 교습은 돈이 안 돼서 외식은 거의 못 해

translation.en: Plus the sauce for my chicken is creeping towards my mashed potatoes, so I gotta move things along.
translation.ko: 거기다 소름 끼치게 치킨 소스가 으깬 감자 쪽으로 기어가잖아

translation.en: It's got to be hard not being able to let your foods touch.
translation.ko: 음식끼리 못 닿게 하려면 꽤 힘들겠네

translation.en: They can touch. I just can't eat them if they do.
translation.ko: 가끔 닿기도 해 그러면 내가 못 먹을 뿐이지

translation.en: So you're in town for a night. We're dining on the company card.
translation.ko: 넌 날 찾아왔고 우린 법카로 저녁을 먹고 있어

translation.en: Why did my dad send you?
Your dad didn't send me.
Can't two old friends hang out without there being an agenda?
translation.ko: 무슨 일 없으면 친구끼리 밥도 못 먹냐?

translation.en: If they're honest with one another.
Okay, Anna sent me.
translation.ko: 알았어, 애나가 보냈고 무슨 일 있어

translation.en: -There is an agenda. -Boom.
translation.ko: 알았어, 애나가 보냈고 무슨 일 있어 - 역시! - 장례식 이후에 아빠랑 얘기했어?

translation.en: Have you spoken to your dad since your mom's memorial?
A couple of times. Why?
How'd he seem? He's not doing great.
Kept talking about some side project at work to turn himself invisible.
translation.ko: 투명 인간이 되는 사이드 프로젝트 얘기를 하시던데

translation.en: He wants to disappear. A shrink would have something to say about that.
translation.ko: 사라지고 싶단 거잖아 상담이 필요한 상태지

translation.en: The board got him a shrink.
The guy shadowed Ellis for a few days and then disappeared.
I don't mean he turned invisible. He just vanished.
translation.ko: 투명 인간이 됐다는 게 아니라 그냥 사라졌어

translation.en: Again, not invisible.
Look, I love my dad. I do. It's just--
Okay, then come to LA and help get him back in the lab.
translation.ko: 그럼 LA로 와서 연구실로 복귀하시게 도와줘

translation.en: -I don't think that's a good idea. -What if I told you… please?
translation.ko: - 좋은 생각이 아닌 것 같아 - 내가 이렇게 말하면? 제발

translation.en: -Remember when I won that science award? -No.
translation.ko: - 내가 과학상 받았을 때 생각나? - 아니

translation.en: Exactly. That's 'cause Ellis Dragon showed up, then they asked him to speak,
translation.ko: 바로 그거야 주최 측은 엘리스 드래건에게 연설을 부탁했고

translation.en: and he got on stage and said my science was correct,
translation.ko: 아버지는 무대에 올라가서 내 과학이 옳다고 말했어

translation.en: but that I needed to think bigger, take more risks, move fast, break stuff.
translation.ko: 하지만 더 크게 생각하고 더 많은 위험을 감수하고 빠르게 움직이고 깨부숴야 한댔지

translation.en: It was an ant farm.
That was a great speech. That's what got me into science.
translation.ko: 정말 멋진 연설이었지 내가 그거 듣고 과학에 빠졌잖아

translation.en: Okay, you're missing my point.
All my dad ever does is try to change me into being more like him,
translation.ko: 아빠는 언제나 날 더 아빠처럼 바꾸려고만 하셔

translation.en: and the rest of the world cheers him on.
It's why I quit science and moved 3,000 miles away.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 과학을 그만두고 5천 km를 날아온 거야

translation.en: At least with my mom around, she could run interference,
but without her, it's exhausting.
Jackson, Ellis is spiraling,
which I've recently learned only goes in one direction,
translation.ko: 최근에 알았는데 한 방향으로만 가고 계신대

translation.en: and now you're the only family he has.
Okay. I'll go. For 24 hours. That's it.
Excellent. You'll regret it.
Don't you mean I won't regret it?
No. I'm lowering your expectations, so you won't be disappointed.
translation.ko: 아니, 네가 실망하지 않게 기대치를 낮추는 중이야

translation.en: Oh my God. Why am I doing this?
translation.ko: 아이고야 내가 왜 이러고 있는 거야?

translation.en: Perfect.
-Come in. -Hi, Anna.
Jackson! Oh, you made it.
So good to see you.
-Take a seat. -Oh, okay.
So your father’s been working on an exciting, new project.
translation.ko: 네 아버지는 흥미로운 새 프로젝트를 하고 계셨어

translation.en: It’s a way of drawing carbon out of the atmosphere and then using that to manufacture concrete.
translation.ko: 대기에 있는 탄소를 추출해 콘크리트를 만드는 프로젝트지

translation.en: It'll lock up climate-changing gases for over a thousand years
translation.ko: 이건 기후 변화 가스를 천 년 이상 가둬서

translation.en: and will literally save the world.
translation.ko: 말 그대로 이 세상을 구할 거야

translation.en: -You like the world, right? -Some aspects of it.
-Still worth saving, right? -Some aspects of it.
translation.ko: - 그래도 구할 가치가 있지? - 어떤 면에서는요

translation.en: Me too.
Now, Ellis has always been eccentric, and we love that about him. Just love it.
translation.ko: 엘리스는 늘 괴짜였고 우린 그런 엘리스를 사랑해

translation.en: But since your mother passed away, he's been, well,
translation.ko: 그런데 너희 어머니가 돌아가신 뒤로는 뭐랄까…

translation.en: I'm gonna use the phrase "even weirder."
Hmm. What happened to the therapist that you got him?
I don't know. He disappeared. What do you want me to do about it?
translation.ko: 몰라, 사라졌어 사람들은 종종 그러잖아 내가 뭘 어떡하겠니?

translation.en: Okay.
The point is it's been weeks since your father set foot in the lab
translation.ko: 문제는, 너희 아버지가 몇 주째 연구실에 발을 안 들이셔

translation.en: to work on that important project that will save the world,
translation.ko: 세상을 구할 그 프로젝트를 연구하셔야 하는데

translation.en: which I know isn't perfect.
Still, we all love polar bears, right? Don't want to see them die.
translation.ko: 우린 다 북극곰을 사랑하지 녀석들이 죽는 건 보기 싫잖아

translation.en: So we need him back in the lab. I believe it's also what he needs.
translation.ko: 그러니까 엘리스는 연구실로 돌아가야 해 엘리스에게도 필요한 일이고

translation.en: Well, I'll talk to him, but I'm not optimistic.
-Great. You're all we have. -What?
-Off you pop. -Do you know where he is?
I'm already regretting this, so I feel like I should move quickly.
translation.ko: 여기 온 걸 벌써 후회 중이라 빨리 움직여야겠어요

translation.en: It's Tuesday. He doesn't come in on Tuesdays anymore.
translation.ko: 오늘은 화요일이지 이제 화요일에는 출근 안 하셔

translation.en: -Oh, why not? -You are asking all the right questions.
Jackson! Malcolm told me you might be coming.
translation.ko: 잭슨! 맬컴한테 너 올지도 모른다고 들었어

translation.en: Oh, Juan, this is my son.
The musician. Flutist.
Or is it flautist? I'm sorry. I know you've told me,
translation.ko: 플루트라고 해야 하나? 미안, 네가 그때 말했는데

translation.en: but all I can remember is that it is a life of constant struggle.
translation.ko: 플루트라고 해야 하나? 미안, 네가 그때 말했는데 고난의 연속이란 말만 기억나네

translation.en: I know there's not a lot of successful flute players in the world, but that's a good thing.
translation.ko: 유명한 플루트 연주자가 많진 않죠 근데 오히려 좋아요

translation.en: -Supply and demand. Not much supply. -Because there's no demand.
translation.ko: - 수요와 공급, 공급이 적잖아요 - 수요가 없으니까

translation.en: Why are you working on a landscaping crew? Let's talk about your life choices.
translation.ko: 왜 조경 일을 하세요? 삶의 선택에 관해 듣고 싶네요

translation.en: I used to teach philosophy.
-But then one night, men came-- -Not you, Juan.
translation.ko: - 그런데 어느 날 밤, 남자들이… - 아저씨 말고요

translation.en: Because in order for me to be creative in my other job,
I need to expand my experiences.
I thought that's what the microdosing was for.
translation.ko: 그건 소량의 환각제 복용 이유 아니었나요?

translation.en: -He took too much. Danced with a ficus. -It was heartbreakingly beautiful.
translation.ko: 엘리스는 대량 복용하고 무화과나무와 춤을 췄어 가슴 미어지게 아름다웠지

translation.en: But, yes, I'm taking a break.
In the meantime, this work helps me feel alive.
translation.ko: 그래, 난 잠시 쉬는 동안 이 일을 하면서 살아 있음을 느끼고 있어

translation.en: To feel I'm having an immediate effect on something. Have you ever laid sod?
translation.ko: 내 행동의 결과가 즉각적으로 보이거든 너 잔디 깔아봤니?

translation.en: Nope, Dad, I live in New York. Last week, I broke up a fight between two rats.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 저 뉴욕에 살아요 지난주엔 쥐들이 싸우는 걸 말렸죠

translation.en: In the morning, there's nothing but dirt.
By mid-afternoon, there’s a vibrant green lawn.
translation.ko: 근데 오후 중반이 되면 생기 넘치는 녹색 잔디가 생기지

translation.en: It’s like giving birth.
To a lawn.
That's great. Let's get out of the hole,
translation.ko: - 잔디를 낳지 - 좋네요 얼른 나와요, 연구실로 가서 진행 중인 프로젝트를 보여주세요

translation.en: and go to the lab and show me the project you're working on.
translation.ko: 얼른 나와요, 연구실로 가서 진행 중인 프로젝트를 보여주세요

translation.en: Or I can give you the shovel, and you can see what you've been missing.
translation.ko: 아니면 네가 삽을 들든가 뭘 놓치며 살았나 알게 될 거다

translation.en: Try something new. Expand your world.
translation.ko: 새로운 걸 해봐, 네 세계를 넓혀

translation.en: So I can be more like you? Microdosing and making love to a tree?
translation.ko: 아버지처럼 되라고요? 환각제 먹고 나무랑 비비적대고?

translation.en: There was no sex. It was a straight bossa nova.
Right?
What's so wrong with being more like me?
translation.ko: 그리고 나처럼 되는 게 뭐 어때서?

translation.en: How many times have you been on the cover of Time?
I don't want to be you. There's enough you in the world already.
translation.ko: 난 아빠가 되기 싫어요 세상엔 아빠 하나로 충분해요

translation.en: -It hurts to see him go like this. -He doesn't want me in his life.
translation.ko: - 저러고 가는 걸 보니 속상하네 - 자기 삶에 끼어들지 말래

translation.en: -Perhaps because you try to change him. -I just want to help him.
translation.ko: - 자네가 바꾸려 드니까 - 난 쟤를 돕고 싶은 거야

translation.en: Children. They want our help. They also want to be loved as they are.
translation.ko: 물론 우리 도움도 필요하지만 애들은 있는 그대로 사랑받길 원해

translation.en: How can we accept them without condition and, at the same time,
translation.ko: 어떻게 하면 애들을 조건 없이 받아들이면서

translation.en: help them to live lives they cannot imagine?
translation.ko: 쟤들이 상상도 못 한 삶을 살게 도와줄 수 있을까?

translation.en: Tell me.
Go. Find out together.
Why can't philosophers ever just give a clear answer?
translation.ko: 왜 철학자들은 명확한 답을 주지 않는 거야?

translation.en: -Why do you want them to? -[groans]
Jackson. Jackson, don't leave.
Why?
I want to show you what we've been working on. In the lab, right?
Yeah, in the lab. So put your car in my car and we'll go together.
translation.ko: 그래, 연구실에서 내 차에 네 차 싣고 같이 가자

translation.en: -This is amazing. Is it a plant? -It's a biomass.
It's 10,000 times more dense than a plant.
-Actually-- -Roughly 10,000 times.
It's 9,942 times.
Like a plant, it sucks carbon dioxide from the air.
100,000 of these would be the equivalent of a trillion trees.
-900 billion. -Roughly a trillion trees.
-Which would pull 40 billion tons-- -39.247--
Roughly 40 billion tons of climate-changing carbon gases
translation.ko: 매년 약 400억 톤의 기후 변화 탄소 가스를

translation.en: from the atmosphere every year.
Boom. Earth wins. Suck on that, all y'all who bet against us and science.
translation.ko: 짠! 지구의 승리죠 우리와 과학에 반대한 놈들은 다 엿 먹어라!

translation.en: Okay.
But wait, there's more! Ruby, tell us what else the Earth wins?
translation.ko: - 그렇죠 - 그게 다가 아니야 루비, 지구의 승리 말고 또 뭐가 있지?

translation.en: No, it is Luna's time to shine. Luna, explain, simply, without numbers.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 이젠 루나가 뽐낼 차례예요 루나, 숫자 빼고 간단하게 설명해

translation.en: When the biomass reaches its maximum density, we add an enzyme
translation.ko: 바이오매스가 최대 밀도에 도달하면 우린 효소를 넣을 거고

translation.en: that converts the carbon to a material that can be used to make concrete.
translation.ko: 그게 탄소를 콘크리트를 만드는 데 사용되는 물질로 바꾸죠

translation.en: Boom, go to hell, assholes.
Sorry. Sometimes, I'm not great with interaction. Boom.
translation.ko: 미안해요 내가 가끔 눈치가 없어요, 짠!

translation.en: So we have been working with dependent dehydrogenases,
translation.ko: 그래서 우린 의존성 탈수 효소를 연구해 왔는데

translation.en: but we haven't been getting enough electron transfer between the peroxidase.
translation.ko: 과산화 효소 간의 전자 이동이 충분하지 않아요

translation.en: Have you tried isolating the O2 independent oxidoreductase?
translation.ko: 산소 독립 산화 환원 효소를 분리해 봤나?

translation.en: -Is he smarter than us? -My parents think so.
translation.ko: - 대표님이 우리보다 똑똑해? - 우리 부모님은 그렇대

translation.en: Nonsense. You are all brilliant, including this one,
translation.ko: 무슨, 자네들 모두 훌륭해 이 친구를 포함해서

translation.en: who uses his intelligence to blow through a tube with holes in it.
translation.ko: 구멍 뚫린 관에 바람 부는 데 지능을 사용하고 있지만

translation.en: -Mm. Thank you. It's good to be here. -[chuckles]
Ruby studied tissue regeneration at MIT,
which is what Jackson studied getting his engineering degree at Cornell.
Before he made "other choices."
Really? I worked on an artificial nose.
Oh, cool. I worked on a toe. It's the nose of the foot.
Oh, one of my professors made a penis. Nose of the crotch.
translation.ko: 한 교수님은 성기를 만드셨어요 가랑이의 코죠

translation.en: -Luna. -I'm seeing it too.
I need to show you something.
What?
Um, well, you know, I'm just here for one night, so…
Don't fall in love with you?
Thanks for the heads-up. That's so my thing.
No, that's not what I meant. Mm-mm. What I meant was….
I'm gonna go find my dad.
See if you can get him back here.
translation.ko: 찾으면 모셔 와요 요즘 연구실에 잘 안 계셔서요

translation.en: -He hasn't been around much. -Will do. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 찾으면 모셔 와요 요즘 연구실에 잘 안 계셔서요 그럴게요

translation.en: Oh, no, now I have to watch you walk away? How will I ever resist that?
translation.ko: 이젠 떠나는 당신을 봐야 하나요? 그걸 어떻게 견디죠?

translation.en: Luna, do you know where my dad went?
Jesus!
[Ellis] We're working on an invisibility cloak. It's not 100% yet.
translation.ko: 투명 망토를 만드는 중인데 아직 100%는 아니야

translation.en: There’s also the classic “invisibility cloak eye dilemma.”
translation.ko: 고질적 문제인 '투명 망토 눈의 딜레마'도 남았죠

translation.en: You need holes in the fabric, so the person can see out.
But then it looks like two eyes floating in space.
translation.ko: 그럼 허공에 눈만 떠다니는 것처럼 보이겠죠

translation.en: Which is the exact opposite of being invisible.
[Ellis] More like the shroud of “Holy shit! What's that?"
-Nanofilament. -Excuse me?
Whatever you're using to bend light so it doesn’t reflect
needs to be so thin you can see through it.
translation.ko: 그걸 관통해서 볼 수 있을 만큼 얇으면 되죠

translation.en: -Have we tried that? -We've talked about it.
Go! Make it happen.
translation.ko: 가, 현실로 만들어 빛이 이렇게 말하게 해

translation.en: I want light to say, “Where is he?” “I don’t know.” "Never trusted that guy."
translation.ko: 가, 현실로 만들어 빛이 이렇게 말하게 해 '어디 있지?', '몰라' '못 믿을 놈이라니까'

translation.en: Okay, sure. Let's piss off light.
But that could take years, and we have karaoke tonight.
translation.ko: 하지만 몇 년이 걸릴 수도 있고 오늘은 가라오케의 밤이에요

translation.en: -Oh! I hope that you're-- -[Luna] I'm not singing.
translation.ko: - 그럼 자네도… - 전 노래 안 해요

translation.en: This is so cool.
You'd love it here.
No, don't start with that.
I'm not coming to work for you. I play the flute.
translation.ko: 전 아빠 회사에서 일 안 해요 플루트 연주할 거예요

translation.en: That did not sound strong.
That's because it's the flute.
At least come to karaoke.
Ruby's gonna there. She's young, smart, and hasn't seen you play the flute.
translation.ko: 루비도 올 거야, 젊고 똑똑하지 네가 플루트 부는 것도 안 봤고

translation.en: I'm not hooking up with Ruby.
And stop trying to turn me into someone else.
translation.ko: 날 다른 사람으로 바꾸려고 하지 마세요

translation.en: I don't want you to be someone else. I want you to be exactly a version of you.
translation.ko: 다른 사람이 되라는 게 아니야 너의 한 버전이 되라는 거지

translation.en: A version of me?
-Exactly sort of you. -So not me.
translation.ko: - 너의 한 종류지 - 그럼 내가 아니네요

translation.en: You, but with some tweaks. Would you like to hear what they are?
translation.ko: 몇 가지가 변형된 너지 그게 뭔지 들어볼래?

translation.en: No, I'm not the one who needs fixing here.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 달라져야 하는 건 제가 아니에요

translation.en: Why make this about me?
You love it when it's about you. It's always about you.
translation.ko: 아빠는 아빠 얘기 좋아하잖아요 늘 자기 위주죠

translation.en: And, by the way, this is about you.
-Okay. We can talk about me. -Good.
But not right now. I have to choose my song for karaoke.
translation.ko: 지금은 말고 가라오케에서 부를 노래 골라야 해

translation.en: Please come. You can tear into me there.
translation.ko: 같이 가자 거기서는 날 대놓고 깔 수 있어

translation.en: I killed that shit.
Baller move, singing the same song right after me.
translation.ko: 굉장하네, 내 다음 차례에 나랑 같은 노래를 부르다니

translation.en: Perhaps to teach you how it's meant to be done.
translation.ko: 이렇게 불러야 한다고 가르쳐 주려고 그랬나 봐요

translation.en: I don't think I know you.
The important thing is do you know yourself?
translation.ko: 당신이 당신 자신을 아느냐가 중요한 거 아니겠어요?

translation.en: Yeah! Anna Bennet! The best singer/CFO in Biotech!
translation.ko: 생명 공학계 최고의 가수이자 CFO인 애나 베닛이었습니다!

translation.en: And yes, I’m including Jeannette at United Therapeutics,
translation.ko: 물론 유나이티드 테라퓨틱스의 지넷도 빼놓을 수 없죠

translation.en: who's got a fine voice
but is weak on inductive reasoning and financial forecasting.
translation.ko: 귀납적 추리와 재무 예측력은 살짝 떨어져요

translation.en: Come on, you know she is. You know she is.
Oh, hey.
Hi. I was just taking a break.
Don't think I don't enjoy loud people or crowded spaces. So my jam.
translation.ko: 내가 사람 많고 시끄러운 걸 싫어한다고 생각하지 말아요 좋아 죽어요

translation.en: Yeah, I came to talk to my dad,
but I've only got to watch him take a great song and skin it alive.
translation.ko: 훌륭한 곡을 처참하게 망치는 것만 봤네요

translation.en: And that's what happens when literally no one says no to you.
translation.ko: 아무도 쓴소리를 안 할 때 벌어지는 일이죠

translation.en: [grunts] So, uh, why'd you come tonight?
I've been told I should push myself out of my comfort zone.
Yeah, I've been told I could use a few tweaks too.
translation.ko: 나도 그런 얘기 들었어요 몇 가지 변형이 필요하대요

translation.en: When I was six, my dad made me be in the school play.
translation.ko: 6살 때 아빠가 학교 연극에 참여하게 하셨어요

translation.en: And then he heckled me.
"No one can hear you. Speak louder."
I wanted to cry but was afraid he'd yell to cry louder.
translation.ko: 내가 울면 아빠가 더 크게 울라고 소리칠까 봐 무서웠어요

translation.en: -So I just peed. -Oh.
-Loudly. -That's the saddest thing I've ever heard.
translation.ko: - 아주 크게요 - 이렇게 슬픈 얘기는 처음이에요

translation.en: Thank you. See, I'm good at meeting people.
translation.ko: 고마워요 봐요, 나 사람들하고 잘 어울려요

translation.en: -Uh, my dad thinks I'm wrong. -About what?
Just generally. Like about everything.
Oh. Well, what do you think?
I don't know. I'm trying to make a living playing the flute.
That might be a mistake. Who hires flutists?
translation.ko: 실수일지도 모르죠 누가 플루트 연주자를 고용해요?

translation.en: People who want to rid their village of rats.
translation.ko: 마을에서 쥐 떼를 없애고 싶은 사람들?

translation.en: And that happened, like, literally once.
Yeah, and that Pied Piper dude didn’t even get paid.
translation.ko: 피리 부는 사나이도 돈 못 받았잖아요

translation.en: [chuckles] It's true, yeah. His dad was probably like, “All you got was children?”
translation.ko: 맞아요, 그 아빠가 이랬을걸요? '애들밖에 못 받았냐?'

translation.en: Yeah, and he was, like, "Oh, leave me alone, Dad. I know what I’m doing."
translation.ko: 그럼 그 사람은 이랬겠죠 '그냥 둬요, 내가 알아서 해요'

translation.en: -"Everyone gets paid in children first.” -There you are. Come on, you're up.
translation.ko: '처음엔 다 돈 대신 애들을 받는다고요' 이제 네 차례야

translation.en: No, I'm not singing. You said we'd talk.
translation.ko: 난 노래 안 해요 우리 얘기하기로 했잖아요

translation.en: Sing first. Come on. Come on, It'll be fun.
Please don't tell me what's fun.
You like karaoke. I don't. So what?
[Ellis] Expand your horizons. Live a little.
Maybe go to the gym.
Okay. Maybe you should go to work and stay there.
translation.ko: 알겠어요 아빠는 회사에 좀 붙어 있어요

translation.en: Maybe don't spend a day giving birth to lawns.
I just want to expand my world. Why is that such a problem for you?
translation.ko: 난 그냥 내 세계를 넓히려는 거야 그게 왜 문제가 되는데?

translation.en: -You can go. -Thank you.
Dad, if you can't focus on work, the real work you're supposed to be doing, the board will get rid of you.
translation.ko: 아빠가 해야 할 일에 집중 못 하면 이사회가 아빠를 쫓아낼 거예요

translation.en: That's ridiculous. Besides, all the work that is meant to be done will get done.
translation.ko: 웃기지 말라 그래 그리고 될 일은 다 될 거야

translation.en: Juan taught me that when we got behind on the Mendelbaum Zen garden.
translation.ko: 불교식 정원 일이 늦어졌을 때 후안한테 배웠어

translation.en: Hmm, okay. I tried.
I love you. I'm going to the airport. I'll see you at Christmas.
I miss your mother.
So much I can't stand it.
And something has shifted. My…
My brain, I… I can't just problem-solve anymore.
translation.ko: 내 뇌가… 더는 문제를 해결할 수가 없어

translation.en: I need to feel excited. I need to feel inspired. I need to just… feel.
translation.ko: 흥분을 느껴야 해 영감을 느끼고, 난 그냥… 느껴야 해

translation.en: -Tell me how to help you. -Support my landscaping.
translation.ko: - 제가 어떻게 도우면 돼요? - 내 조경을 지지해 줘

translation.en: [exhales] I support you. I'm the only person in your life who doesn't indulge you.
translation.ko: 난 아빠를 지지해요 아빠한테 쓴소리하는 건 나뿐이죠

translation.en: It's never too late.
Oh, come on, you're leaving?
We were just spitballing ideas. You don't need to take the first one.
translation.ko: 떠오르는 대로 막 내뱉은 거잖아 첫 의견을 따를 필요는 없어

translation.en: Hey, everything all right? Where's Jackson?
-Uh, he left. -What?
Without his mom, I don’t know how to do this.
translation.ko: 케이티 없이 어떻게 해야 할지 모르겠어

translation.en: Katie always helped us find the words so we could talk.
translation.ko: 우리가 대화할 수 있게 늘 중간에서 도와줬거든

translation.en: -Now we just make each other crazy. -Maybe he just needs to cool off.
translation.ko: - 지금은 서로 성질만 긁어 - 그냥 열 식히러 갔을 거예요

translation.en: No, I know him. He's done.
You know him, do you?
I don't know him.
My son, the flutist.
Or flautist. I really have to lock that down.
As much as I would like you to stay and work with me, you have a gift.
translation.ko: 네가 남아서 나랑 같이 일했으면 좋겠지만 넌 재능이 있어

translation.en: A very, very, very niche, potentially useless gift. But still…
translation.ko: 활동 영역이 매우 좁고 쓸모없을 가능성이 큰 재능이지만

translation.en: I miss her too.
I know you do.
And I miss this.
[Anna] Jackson, Jackson.
[inhales sharply] So, um, I was wondering, now that you and your dad are getting along a little better,
you might stay longer.
I have to give a lesson tomorrow. Charlotte, she's excruciating,
translation.ko: 내일 샬럿 수업 있어요 실력이 끔찍한 수준이라 제 도움이 꼭 필요해요

translation.en: so she really needs my help.
translation.ko: 실력이 끔찍한 수준이라 제 도움이 꼭 필요해요

translation.en: Okay, I wasn't gonna tell you this because it's kind of intense.
translation.ko: 그래, 이건 너무 심각한 얘기라 안 하려고 했어

translation.en: Also, I don't want to make you an accessory.
An accessory like a hat or a brooch?
To a crime, Jackson. An accessory to a crime.
Like an ugly hat or a brooch could be a crime?
That therapist the board brought in to work with your father.
Well, I kind of know what happened to him.
Oh my God. What happened to him?
-What's poppin'? -The therapist that the board sent?
-Leslie. -Yeah.
-What happened to him? -He's in my basement.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 됐어요? - 우리 집 지하실에 있어

translation.en: He's in your basement?
You locked him in your basement. I think that’s worth mentioning.
translation.ko: 지하실에 가둬놨죠 제일 중요한 말은 쏙 빼먹으시네

translation.en: God dammit!
He was threatening to send the board a very unflattering report on me
translation.ko: 나한테 매우 불리한 소견서를 써서 이사회에 보낸다고 협박하면서

translation.en: unless I gave him a lot of money. Which I did.
-And then he wanted more, so-- -How long's he been down there?
translation.ko: - 그런데 더 달라잖아 - 얼마나 가둬 놓은 거예요?

translation.en: -A couple of days. -And you knew?
Only since yesterday when your father was naked, and I had a lot on my plate.
translation.ko: 어제 알았어 네 아버지는 알몸이었고 난 아주 바빴지

translation.en: -[whispers] Help us. -Is this a problem? Yes.
But like invisibility, I believe that it is one that can be solved.
translation.ko: 하지만 투명 망토처럼 난 이것도 해결될 거라고 믿어

translation.en: Ugh, I gotta go feed him. You know what? He gets very upset when his dinner's late.
translation.ko: 밥 주러 가야겠다 레슬리는 저녁 늦으면 난리가 나거든
